... can mod my Keyboard, ot the space above my deskr to make the stage eject button look like this....

I want keys, safety toggles and big fricking LED's.... (*** may *** have just have ejected the landing clamps from my Munbase modules on the -deltaV into a 300km orbit, after 5 hours of docking, planning, refueling intercepting and transiting at 25% thrust so the thing did not shake itself apart....)

F9 got recovered 50% of the disaster, still have to re-refuel a 250ton orbital cargo train

Lil'

Alt-L locks staging. The space bar will be inactive until you press Alt-L again.

(Confusingly, this persists between launches. The first time you exit a flight with staging locked, you will spend a minute or two trying to figure out why your next ship won't launch. Even though you read this. I promise.)

Alt-L locks staging. The space bar will be inactive until you press Alt-L again.

OMG!, where were you 30 mins ago when I was ejecting docking clamps into space!!! Srsly, thx for the protip. Will put that to good use on the rerun tomorrow. Still liking the idea of a bank of stage switches bolted to the shelf above the PC... I might take a wander to Maplins tomorrow...
You can also remap staging to something else. I found it way to easy to accidentally hit space, so stage is now enter.

There are a lot of places where you could get such thing done. I would recommend asking around at http://insidesimracing.tv/forums/ forums to find companies that could do it for a reasonable fee.
